content: Yes, Roger Dean has worked with many other bands apart from Yes and Uriah Heep. Some of the other bands he has collaborated with include Atomic Rooster, Asia, Gentle Giant, and Greenslade. His distinctive and imaginative artwork has played a significant role in the visual identity of these bands, and his contributions have helped shape the visual style of progressive rock music. He is known for creating fantastical landscapes and intricately detailed images that often feature organic forms such as trees and flowing water, which have become synonymous with his unique artistic style.
